short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show QR code for current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sure, the Website QR Code Generator Chrome extension is a tool that allows you to create QR codes easily and quickly. With this extension, you can generate QR codes for any website with just one click. All you need to do is install the extension on your Chrome browser, navigate to the website you want to create a QR code for, and then click on the extension icon. The generated QR code can be used for a variety of purposes such as sharing websites, digital marketing campaigns, and more. Additionally, the extension provides customizable options to tailor the appearance and functionality of the generated QR codes to fit your needs.
